name: Playmation
description:
Tech lead for first in-house Disney Consumer Product website, Playmation.com

Communicated directly with 3rd party vendor on designs, coordinating on technical execution and limitations to enhance design and implementation

Programmable product pages with custom applied theming (allies as blue and enemies as red), with producer configurations including left/right layout, feature image, description and features, product thumb, and retail links

Several configurable interactive elements, including touch-enabled hotspot overlays, intro animations on page load and scroll, and dynamic expanding panes

images.caption: Marketing site geared towards parents including product overview and legal information
Marketing site geared towards themed and specific products, with the first iteration being the Avengers play system. The site included storytelling and gameplay mechanics, as well as retailer links.
